risk_factors: None significant. Stable career progression and skills align with job requirements.
growth_signals: Continuous learning through certifications (ISTQB Advanced Level, Agile Testing Certification)
Leadership experience (led QA team of 4 testers)
Experience with CI/CD pipelines and Agile/Scrum methodology
Strong problem-solving and test strategy planning skills
selection_reason: Neha Reddy is an excellent match for the Application Testing Engineer role. She possesses all the must-have technical skills, including manual and automation testing, Selenium, JIRA, Postman, and SQL queries. Her certifications (ISTQB Advanced Level and Agile Testing Certification) and experience with Agile/Scrum and CI/CD pipelines align with the nice-to-have skills. With 5 years of relevant experience, she has demonstrated leadership, problem-solving, and adaptability through her roles, particularly as a Senior QA Engineer. There are no significant risks, and her continuous learning and leadership experience indicate strong growth potential. The only minor drawback is the lack of explicit mention of her current location, but this is mitigated by the hybrid work model.

Responsibilities: Led QA team of 4 testers for enterprise web applications.
Built automation frameworks using Selenium and TestNG.
Performed API testing and integrated test cases into CI/CD pipelines.
Prepared test strategy documents and presented QA reports to stakeholders.
Developed and executed test plans for financial applications.
Conducted database validations using SQL queries.
